test.name: create list by inferring fields
test.url: library(Rlabkey) df <- data.frame(intKey=c(1:3), customInt=c(1:3), customString=c("aaa", "bbb", "ccc")) fields <- labkey.domain.inferFields(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", df) dd <- labkey.domain.createDesign(name="test list", fields=fields) labkey.domain.create(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", domainKind="IntList", domainDesign=dd, options=list(keyName = "intKey"))

test.name: insert rows into the list
test.url:
library(Rlabkey) newrow <- data.frame( customInt=1 , customString="custom string value")
labkey.insertRows(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list", toInsert=newrow)

test.name: update the list domain
test.url:
library(Rlabkey) ## change the type of one of the columns domain <- labkey.domain.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list")
domain$fields[3,]$rangeURI = "xsd:string" domain$fields[3,]$name = "changed to string" labkey.domain.save(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list", domainDesign=domain)

test.name: update the list domain two
test.url:
library(Rlabkey) ## remove one of the columns df <- data.frame(intKey=c(1:3), customInt=c(1:3)) fields <- labkey.domain.inferFields(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", df) oldDesign <- labkey.domain.get(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list") newDesign <- labkey.domain.createDesign(name="test list", fields=fields)
newDesign$domainId = oldDesign$domainId newDesign$domainURI = oldDesign$domainURI
newDesign$fields[1,]$propertyId = oldDesign$fields[1,]$propertyId newDesign$fields[1,]$propertyURI = oldDesign$fields[1,]$propertyURI newDesign$fields[2,]$propertyId = oldDesign$fields[2,]$propertyId newDesign$fields[2,]$propertyURI = oldDesign$fields[2,]$propertyURI
labkey.domain.save(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list", domainDesign=newDesign) newrow <- data.frame( customInt=2 , customString="custom string value")
labkey.insertRows(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list", toInsert=newrow)

test.name: drop the list domain
test.url: library(Rlabkey) labkey.domain.drop(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", schemaName="lists", queryName="test list")

test.name: create a domain from a domain template
test.url: library(Rlabkey) labkey.domain.create(baseUrl="%baseUrl%", folderPath="%projectName%", domainTemplate="Priority", module="simpletest", domainGroup="todolist")
